text: While re-entering the bunker with a high-status member,
the unreliable GLaDOS, or whatever they call it, got triggered.
My client was mistaken for an infected, can you imagine how that made us look?
He nearly got killed by the lasers, and don't even get me started on the drones!
The worst part is, the research team couldn't even deactivate it through the console.
In the end they had to PHYSICALLY DESTROY THE SERVERS!!!
Disable the damn thing or I will do it myself
